definition: to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: In the neighboring room, the sound of iron articles being moved was audible.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁屋子裏傳來一陣翻動廢鐵的聲音。

sentences.english: The wind leafs through the trees:and I know what passes there for words, and sometimes repeat them softly.
sentences.chinese: 風翻動林葉，我知曉它們的話語，並時而柔聲複誦。

sentences.english: Even now, the match does not stop changes the page.
sentences.chinese: 即使現在，對手也不停地翻動書頁。

sentences.english: I heard someone rustling the papers in my office.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見有人在我的辦公室裏沙沙地翻動文件。

sentences.english: When he turned the pages, the top of his head in the branches have something shook up.
sentences.chinese: 當他翻動書頁時，他頭頂的樹枝中有樣東西晃動起來。

sentences.english: The admiral flipped the chart and showed a close-up of the submarine.
sentences.chinese: 海軍上將翻動圖樣，展示一幅這艘潛艇的近照。

sentences.english: Run heatproof rubber spatula around frittata to loosen and slide out onto plate .
sentences.chinese: 用耐熱的橡膠小鏟翻動大煎餅四周並倒入盤中。

sentences.english: Even if the present, the match doesnot stop changes the page.
sentences.chinese: 即使目前，敵手也不停地翻動冊頁。

sentences.english: Feathers fluttering on the lances of the arrogant men.
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的男人們手持長矛，矛身上羽毛翻動。

sentences.english: Its body flips and spins, guarding itself with its altogether more sturdy metal casing.
sentences.chinese: 它不斷翻動和旋轉，用更堅固的金屬外殼保護自己。

sentences.english: She had pulled an old sheet-iron stove from a corner, and she was rummaging among the old heap of iron.
sentences.chinese: 她從屋角里拖出一箇舊鐵皮爐子，又去翻動一堆廢鐵。

sentences.english: The curtain that hung from the stage to the ground billowed , as if in a strong breeze.
sentences.chinese: 從戲臺垂到地下的簾子翻動着，象是被很大的風吹着。

sentences.english: Even if the present, the match does not stop changes thepage.
sentences.chinese: 即使現在，對手也不停地翻動書頁。

sentences.english: Drop dough balls into hot oil, frying until golden brown, turning as needed.
sentences.chinese: 把面球放到熱油裏，炸至金黃，可根據需要翻動面球。

sentences.english: Even if the present; the mover atch does not stop chbeneficialges the pyears.
sentences.chinese: 儘管目前，對手也不停地翻動書頁。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
